topics.body:
Was going through some of the pictures on my computer recently and found a picture from afghanistan, enjoy:
!http://i.imgur.com/VfZYe0C.jpg!
A buddy of mine and a german tank and soldier behind him. The german soldiers were pretty damned cool. They bought me beer which technically I should not have had.

I'm gonna keep looking for the ones from Iraq. It took more there.
